meta.title: Home - West Bloomfield School District: Portrait of a Graduate

meta.name: description
meta.content: Home - West Bloomfield School District is helping students to be their best IN and FOR the world through our Portrait of a Graduate initiative.

meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Home, West Bloomfield School District Portrait of a Graduate
Home - West Bloomfield School District is helping students to be their best IN and FOR the world through our Portrait of a Graduate initiative.
Home - West Bloomfield School District: Portrait of a Graduate

body.class: fsLiveMode fsHasHeader fsHasMenu fsHasFooter fsHasOneColumnLayout home fsHasTheme2

li.a: Budget and Salary / Compensation Transparency Reporting

img.alt: Budget and Salary / Compensation Transparency Reporting

figcaption.p: WBSD offers Meal Service to all children

img.alt: Teachers working in lab with students
Image of ACS in district banner

figcaption.p: School Buildings CLOSED for 2019-20 school year

a.title: Link to WBSD Cloud Learning Information

div.p: In West Bloomfield School District, we will be transitioning our teaching and learning online through Cloud Learning. It is our goal each day to do what is best for kids and we believe keeping the pathways to education open for our students fall directly in line with that objective.

strong.a: Learn more about about Cloud Learning in West Bloomfield!

img.alt: WBSD Portrait of a Graduate logo image

a.title: Powered by Finalsite opens in a new window

div.p: In an effort to streamline the process of finding information related to current events in our state, country and the globe, we've created this launcher to create an efficient experience for our website.
